text: ql -ayha alrswl-: allah eaza wajala hu alqadir wahdah ealaa 'an yursil ealaykum edhabana min fawqikum kalrrajm 'aw altwfan, wama 'ashbah dhlk, 'aw min taht 'arjulikum kalzlazl walkhsf, 'aw ykhlt 'amrukum ealaykum ftkwnu frqana mtnahrt yuqtal baedukum bedana. anzur -ayha alrswl- kayf nunwwie hjjna alwadhat lhwla' almushrikin laealahum yfhmwn fyetbru?
